subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Woody Johnson, the owner of the Jets, discussed why he fired Rex Ryan as coach and John Idzik as general manager, saying, “I thought it was in the best interest of the team to do it.”
snippet: Woody Johnson, the owner of the Jets, discussed why he fired Rex Ryan as coach and John Idzik as general manager, saying, “I thought it was in the best interest of the team to do it.”
